definition: post and telecommunications
post (office)/mail
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
Nanjing Post and Communications University
pinyin: Nan2 jing1 You2 dian4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: The hotel is in front of the post office.
I'am Chen Tianming , from Shanghai post and telecommuincate service development company, I'am direct of the company's overseas department.
sentences.chinese: 我是上海郵電服務發展公司還外部主任陳天明。

sentences.english: Is there a post office near here?
Zhang Ming graduated from Beijing University of Post and Telecommunications with degree of M. S. in computer science.
sentences.chinese: 張明畢業於北京郵電大學，獲得計算機科學碩士學位。

sentences.english: D adviser for School of Information and Telecommunication Engineering, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications (BUPT).
sentences.chinese: 北京郵電大學信息與通信工程學院兼職博導。

sentences.english: He proposed half a dozen accords in such areas as culture, post and communications.
sentences.chinese: 郵電和通訊領域提出了六項建議。

sentences.english: Communication with other countries was difficult during telephone and postal strike.
sentences.chinese: 在郵電工人罷工期間與其它國家的通訊很困難。

sentences.english: The bank is between the restaurant and the post office.
sentences.chinese: 銀行在餐館和郵電局的中間。

sentences.english: Follow this road to the end and you will see a post office.
sentences.chinese: 沿這條路走到底就能看見一家郵電局。

sentences.english: Our reporter interviewed the Beijing university of posts and telecommunications and telecom engineering college professor Chen lei.
sentences.chinese: 本報記者採訪了北京郵電大學電信工程學院教授陳磊。

sentences.english: He teaches law at the Beijing University of Post and Telecommunications.
sentences.chinese: 他在北京郵電大學教授法律。

sentences.english: I'm Chen Tianming, director of the Overseas Department of Shanghai Post and Telecommunications Service Development Company.
sentences.chinese: 我是上海郵電服務發展公司海外部主任陳天明。

sentences.english: In recent years, the posts and telecommunications industry is developing very rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 近年來我國郵電通信事業迅速發展。

sentences.english: There is a bus stop near the post office.
sentences.chinese: 在郵電局附近有一個公車站。

sentences.english: A:Drop me at the Manhattan Post Office.
sentences.chinese: 我在曼哈頓郵電局下車。

sentences.english: Yun Li, Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications, China.
sentences.chinese: 惲哩，南京郵電大學電信，中國。
